function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Provide personal protective equipment ppe to maintenance staff and installers, implement strict hygiene protocols and social distancing measures during installation and maintenance activities.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration with economists and financial experts, validation of economic model against real-world economic data, sensitivity analysis of the economic model.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Comparative analysis of virus rna concentration and reported covid-19 cases","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of pcr conditions, use of appropriate control samples","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improved cleaning protocols and containment measures during ionizer maintenance","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of multiple sensors and data validation to improve accuracy of occupancy and density estimation.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance education and awareness campaigns on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate real-world data and considerations into the model to account for variability.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement consistent airflow management strategies and consider alternative ventilation methods","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of larger living spaces, improved shelter conditions","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use additional search strategies to capture diverse study designs","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improved early detection systems and response protocols","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of analytical tools for multi-residue analysis of a wide range of biomarker groups","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of effective disinfection and purification techniques, advanced tools and preparations","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Peer review and validation of the modeling approach by experts in epidemiology and infectious diseases.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement secure and privacy-focused data exchange protocols, limit data disclosure, and ensure accurate detection of infected individuals.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved access to healthcare","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Green retrofitting","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage participants to get tested for covid-19 and follow public health guidelines on social distancing and mask-wearing.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stopping mass gatherings","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure that culturally adapted messages accurately convey the seriousness of the pandemic and the need for appropriate measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation rates, utilize natural ventilation, and employ carbon dioxide tracer-gas techniques for analysis","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing data collection and coordination among relevant authorities","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure inclusivity and diversity in participant recruitment for wearable device studies","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems, limit occupancy, and implement regular cleaning and disinfection ensure input from public health experts in model development.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure equitable distribution of urban green spaces by prioritizing surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Restructuring workforce","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rigorous testing and monitoring for asymptomatic carriers, public health education on preventive measures for asymptomatic individuals","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and maintaining social distancing measures","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iot-based systems","category":"Use of
